title: Translating the Success of 2018 to 2020
description:
The 2018 midterms will no doubt go down as a success for Democrats. But what can the party learn from that success going into 2020? David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg's national political reporter Sahil Kapur on how the key is not allowing President Trump to control the narrative. 
FOLLOW UP
 Sahil's latest report: Democrats Learn a Big Lesson for 2020 Vote About Taking on Trump
You can follow Sahil at: @sahilkapur
----
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends!
